text: Wah is a village in Attock District of North Punjab, Pakistan. It is famous for the old Pleasure Gardens there dating from the Mughal Empire, and for being the birthplace of a former Governor and Chief Minister of the Punjab during British Indian times, Sir Sikandar Hayat Khan. Wah Cantonment is a large military garrison and township nearby. Category:Attock District Category:Villages in Punjab (Pakistan)
title: Wah
